description:
Ryuji has become like a god, his physical prowess beyond anything human. All he cares about now is to destroy his rival, Junta Momonari! Fortunately for Junta, he`s also the only one who can stop Ryuji now... or rather, the Mega-Playboy can! But if he becomes the Mega-Playboy one more time, he may change forever, dooming the future... and if he doesn`t, he`s dead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バイバイ メガプレイボーイ
